(node:2724) [DEP0060] DeprecationWarning: The `util._extend` API is deprecated. Please use Object.assign() instead.
(Use `kanban-agent --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)

      throw er; // Unhandled 'error' event
      ^
